---
title: Submit Signed Transaction for Broadcast
---

After signing the transaction, you will `PUT /api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` (as always!) and the Staking API will manage broadcasting the transaction to the NEAR network.

### Parameters

- `name` - `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` - `array`
  - `transaction_payload` - Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```json
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9/next' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
--data   '{
    // highlight-start
  "name": "sign_delegate_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
  // highlight-end
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction payload provided, Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be one of:

- `delegate_tx_broadcasting` — Transaction has been broadcast and confirmed.
- `delegated` — Transaction has been confirmed.

#### Sample Response

```json
{
  "id": "aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9",
  // highlight-next-line
  "state": "delegate_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2022-09-26T16:06:15.163Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "validator_address": "01node.pool.f863973.m0",
    "amount": "25.0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "1a45dcf2292e9f43ddb2053ed913ca84291a820549be5b04075f6e2719173fd0",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2mZPUCSVnhKNL1LwWtGXpMzzck9xgVJRtn5g8fJgwTWP",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-09-26T15:24:43.720Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-09-26T16:05:13.939Z"
}
```
